fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink I noticed, that flickering labels "active title ___ old title Base UI" and "tab changed to __ old index 0" are displayed on the bottom of the page.

Regression, does not occur on 2.0.2.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Launch any test case

Actual result:
Flickering labels are displayed on the bottom of the page

Expected result:
Should not see these flickering labels
fields.summary: Android: Flickering labels displayed while KS testing
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206081630
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120608174150
Device: Motorola Xoom 4.0.3
